article_text:
Tel Aviv—Rioting erupted at a revered holy site in Jerusalem's Old City on Tuesday, hours before a debate in the Israeli parliament over expanding Israeli control over the hilltop compound that is sacred to three religious faiths.

At least 22 were injured and three others arrested when Israeli police moved in to stop several dozen masked Palestinian youth from hurling stones at Israeli troops from the complex, known to Jews as Temple...
